title: Football pies
description: These tasty pies are cooked in small, round foil tins - just like the ones you get at football games.For this recipe you will need 4 small (about 11cm/4in), round foil pie dishes.
ingredients: 250g/9oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
1 free-range egg, beaten for egg wash
a few dashes of Worcestershire sauce
